Trinity::

She didn't move as the bot reached out to touch her cheek. She felt 
the bot's hand gently touch her face. She then relaxed and smiled. 
She moved closer to the bot's face. She giggled. "Your not a mean 
bot.  Your a nice bot." She giggled and nuzzled her head against the 
bot's cheek. "It's ok, I'm sorry I scared you." She smiled and 
giggled.
